===Etymology===
{{Han simp|將|f=爿|t=丬}}. In Simplified Chinese, the top right is simplified to [[夕]] (removing the dot), while in Japanese shinjitai it is simplified to variant of [[爫]], as in top of [[采]]. However, these are represented by the same Unicode code point – see {{w|Han unification}}.
